Ω(...).ready() Use this function to execute code only when the document is ready. Implies readyState of the document. 
            
               Ω('document').ready(()=>{
                  //do stuff here
                  //test function
                  alert('ready() called');
               })
Click to see trial
Ω(...).load() Use this function to execute code only when the window has loaded fully. Implies DOMContentLOaded of the document. 
            
               Ω('window').load(()=>{
                  //do stuff here
                  //test function
                  alert('load() called');
               })
Click to see trial
